generic.message: Well, look at you hitting your goal! Who kidnapped the real you?
Goal reached! Did you accidentally trip into success?
Congrats! Your scale is finally giving you the silent treatment.
Wow, goal achieved! Was your GPS set to 'unexpected fitness'?
You hit your goal! Alert the media – no one saw that coming.
Goal smashed! Is this an alternate universe?
Success! Did you mix up your cheat days with gym days?
You reached the goal! Did you confuse your couch with a treadmill?
Hitting your goal? Check your calendar – is it April Fools' Day?
Target achieved! Are you feeling okay or is this just a phase?
Goal hit! Did you hack the app?
Wow, success! Aliens involved?
You did it! Is your scale drunk?
Goal smashed! Did pigs fly?
Achieved it? Check for body snatchers.
Target reached! Glitch in the matrix?
You won? Someone pinch you.
Goal conquered! Is this a prank?
Hit your goal? Did your mirror finally bribe you?
Goal crushed! Was there a sale on willpower?
You reached it! Is this part of a witness protection program change?
Success! Who are you, and what have you done with the couch potato?
Achieved your goal! Did you accidentally swap snacks with dumbbells?
Target nailed! Did you confuse your lazy Sundays with gym days?
Goal hit! Are you just showing off now?
Wow, you did it! Is your fridge feeling lonely?
Success! Is this your superhero origin story?
Goal conquered! Were you bitten by a radioactive personal trainer?

custom.message: Whoa, gained {x}lbs? Is that a new record?
Oops, {x}lbs heavier? Your scale's crying for help!
Gained {x}lbs? Are you collecting them for a yard sale?
Hello, {x}lbs of extra love! Did you mistake the gym for a buffet?
{x}lbs up? Did you eat the weight plates instead of lifting them?
Bravo, {x}lbs gained! Was that on purpose?
{x}lbs heavier? You're turning into a gravity magnet!
A wild {x}lbs appeared! It's super effective... at tightening your pants.
{x}lbs gained. Is your wardrobe on a stretch goal?
Congrats on the {x}lb gain. Were you trying to level up in weight class?
Gained {x}lbs? Did you swallow a whole cake factory?
{x}lbs up? Even your clothes are giving you the cold shoulder.
Whoa, {x}lbs heavier? Was your workout routine just a rumor?
{x}lbs gained? Maybe it's time your fridge had an intervention.
Added {x}lbs? Is gravity playing favorites with you?
Packed on {x}lbs? Did you mistake a treadmill for a buffet line?
{x}lbs heavier? I hope your sofa's in therapy.
So, {x}lbs gained? Your gym membership is now a museum exhibit.
{x}lbs up? Are you collecting them for a world record?
Gained {x}lbs? You're the reason scales have panic buttons.

customAndTime.message: {x}lbs heavier in just {time}? Did you confuse a marathon with a food sprint?
Gained {x}lbs since {time}? What did you do, eat a whole buffet?
{x}lbs up in {time}? I guess time flies when you're inhaling cookies.
{time} ago you were lighter by {x}lbs. Did you find a candy treasure chest?
Since {time}, you're up {x}lbs. Did your diet take a detour?
{x}lbs gained in {time}? Are you testing the limits of physics?
It's been {time}, and you've gained {x}lbs. Did your fridge declare an open house?
{x}lbs in {time}? Are you on a see-food diet?
You gained {x}lbs in {time}? Is your scale staging a protest?

generic.message: Yikes! Did gravity just get stronger, or is it just you?
Oops! Looks like you're defying the laws of weight loss.
Alert: Your scale is requesting a vacation.
Seems like your snacks are staging a mutiny in there!
Whoa, did you swallow a dumbbell?
Congratulations on your weight gain - said no one ever.
Is your fridge holding your family hostage? Blink twice for yes.
Looks like you're on a seafood diet. You see food and... well, you know.
Your jeans are starting a protest march.
Breaking News: Local hero saves calories from being burned.
